info: All coefficients except KspX from Chapter 5 of Dickson, Sabine and Christian (2007). See attached documentation for functional forms. KspX values taken from Zeebe & Wolf-Gladrow (2001), which come from Mucci (1983).

pH_scales.KP1: Approx Total (see footnote 5, Chapter 5 of Dickson, Sabine and Christian (2007)

pH_scales.KP3: Approx Total (see footnote 5, Chapter 5 of Dickson, Sabine and Christian (2007)
pH_scales.KSi: Approx Total (see footnote 5, Chapter 5 of Dickson, Sabine and Christian (2007)
